column1: Little Goat Diner////The food: it was great. I would be giving this place 5 stars if it was based solely on the flavor
column3: and quality of the items offered. I decided on the Fat Elvis Waffles
column4: and they were fantastic. Our group also got the PQM bacon (nothing really special or unique for a $6 side of bacon)
column6: and the Pork Belly Home Fries. The home fries were very good
column7: the aoli it came with complimented it very well. Although
column8: there were only about 3 small cubed pieces of pork belly for the dish
column9: which was not enough. I wanted to try the cinnamon roll
